trustScoreCalculation.interpretation: Solid prospect with tech-forward culture and clear business case for automation. Marketing agency model naturally benefits from efficiency improvements. Website quality and client portfolio indicate professional, established business. Limited public review data moderates score slightly.

bonuses.reason: Marketing agencies are naturally tech-savvy and understand automation value proposition

adjustments.reason: No public review ratings or testimonials found during research

confidenceReasoning: Website provides good detail on services, positioning, and client portfolio. Modern design and professional messaging indicate established business. Limited public information about company size and financial details.
